pageSetting.title: 微信银行业绩分配日志

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ SELECT F_TIMETOCHAR(RZ.JLSJ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') AS JLSJ ,czy.hymc as xgry,qy.khh,czlxms.dmms as czlx,qy.khmc,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,jl.qsrq,jl.jsrq, '分配比例:' || F_NumToChar(jl.zlbl) as fpbl,jg1.jgmc as qyjg,qy.qyrq, qy.zhdh, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as ggbz from xtb_hygxrz_wxyh rz inner join xtb_hygxjl_wxyh jl on rz.jldh = jl.jldh inner join jxdx_WXYHQYDJB qy on qy.zhdh = rz.zhdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $jsrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh and jg.zxrq>=$jsrq$ inner join khdx_jg jg1 on jg1.jgdh = qy.jgdh INNER JOIN CSB_DMMS CZLXMS ON LOWER(CZLXMS.DMMC)='rzczlx' AND RZ.CZLX=CZLXMS.DMZ inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh where 1=1 and jl.khdxdh = $khdxdh$ and rz.jlsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) AND QY.zhdh LIKE '%$zhdh$%' order by rz.jlsj desc,qy.khh, jl.jldhSELECT F_TIMETOCHAR(RZ.JLSJ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') AS JLSJ ,czy.hymc as xgry,qy.khh,czlxms.dmms as czlx,qy.khmc,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,jl.qsrq,jl.jsrq, '分配比例:' || F_NumToChar(jl.zlbl) as fpbl,jg1.jgmc as qyjg,qy.qyrq, qy.zhdh, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as ggbz from xtb_hygxrz_wxyh rz inner join xtb_hygxjl_wxyh jl on rz.jldh = jl.jldh inner join jxdx_WXYHQYDJB qy on qy.zhdh = rz.zhdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $jsrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh and jg.zxrq>=$jsrq$ inner join khdx_jg jg1 on jg1.jgdh = qy.jgdh INNER JOIN CSB_DMMS CZLXMS ON LOWER(CZLXMS.DMMC)='rzczlx' AND RZ.CZLX=CZLXMS.DMZ inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh where 1=1 and rz.xgrdh = $khdxdh$ and rz.jlsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) AND QY.zhdh LIKE '%$zhdh$%' order by rz.jlsj desc,qy.khh, jl.jldh

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( SELECT F_TIMETOCHAR(RZ.JLSJ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') AS JLSJ ,czy.hymc as xgry,qy.khh,czlxms.dmms as czlx,qy.khmc,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,jl.qsrq,jl.jsrq, '分配比例:' || F_NumToChar(jl.zlbl) as fpbl,jg1.jgmc as qyjg,qy.qyrq, qy.zhdh, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as ggbz from xtb_hygxrz_wxyh rz inner join xtb_hygxjl_wxyh jl on rz.jldh = jl.jldh inner join jxdx_WXYHQYDJB qy on qy.zhdh = rz.zhdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $jsrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh and jg.zxrq>=$jsrq$ inner join khdx_jg jg1 on jg1.jgdh = qy.jgdh INNER JOIN CSB_DMMS CZLXMS ON LOWER(CZLXMS.DMMC)='rzczlx' AND RZ.CZLX=CZLXMS.DMZ inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh where 1=1 and jl.khdxdh = $khdxdh$ and rz.jlsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) AND QY.zhdh LIKE '%$zhdh$%' order by rz.jlsj desc,qy.khh, jl.jldhSELECT F_TIMETOCHAR(RZ.JLSJ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') AS JLSJ ,czy.hymc as xgry,qy.khh,czlxms.dmms as czlx,qy.khmc,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,jl.qsrq,jl.jsrq, '分配比例:' || F_NumToChar(jl.zlbl) as fpbl,jg1.jgmc as qyjg,qy.qyrq, qy.zhdh, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as ggbz from xtb_hygxrz_wxyh rz inner join xtb_hygxjl_wxyh jl on rz.jldh = jl.jldh inner join jxdx_WXYHQYDJB qy on qy.zhdh = rz.zhdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $jsrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh and jg.zxrq>=$jsrq$ inner join khdx_jg jg1 on jg1.jgdh = qy.jgdh INNER JOIN CSB_DMMS CZLXMS ON LOWER(CZLXMS.DMMC)='rzczlx' AND RZ.CZLX=CZLXMS.DMZ inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh where 1=1 and rz.xgrdh = $khdxdh$ and rz.jlsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) AND QY.zhdh LIKE '%$zhdh$%' order by rz.jlsj desc,qy.khh, jl.jldh ) t
